fields.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.content: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan. Combine hot pasta with pancetta, egg mixture, and some pasta water until creamy. Season with pepper and serve immediately.
fields.ingredients:
Spaghetti
Eggs
Parmesan cheese
Pancetta
Black pepper

fields.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
fields.content: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill until charred. In a pan, cook onions, garlic, and ginger. Add spices, tomatoes, and cream to make the sauce. Simmer grilled chicken in the sauce until cooked through. Serve with rice or naan.
fields.ingredients:
Chicken
Yogurt
Garlic
Ginger
Spices
Tomatoes
Cream

fields.title: Avocado Toast
fields.content: Mash ripe avocado and season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Spread onto toasted bread. Top with a fried egg or red pepper flakes as desired. Enjoy immediately.
fields.ingredients:
Avocado
Bread
Salt
Pepper
Lemon juice
Egg (optional)

fields.title: Beef Tacos
fields.content: Cook ground beef with onions and taco seasoning. Warm taco shells and fill with beef mixture. Top with lettuce, cheese, and salsa. Serve with a lime wedge.
fields.ingredients:
Ground beef
Taco seasoning
Taco shells
Lettuce
Cheese
Salsa
Lime

fields.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
fields.content: Heat oil in a wok, add garlic, ginger, and vegetables. Stir fry for a few minutes. Add soy sauce and sesame oil. Serve over rice or noodles.
fields.ingredients:
Broccoli
Carrots
Bell peppers
Garlic
Ginger
Soy sauce
Sesame oil

fields.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
fields.content: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Cream together butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
fields.ingredients:
Butter
Sugar
Brown sugar
Eggs
Vanilla extract
Flour
Baking soda
Salt
Chocolate chips

fields.title: Caesar Salad
fields.content: Combine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing in a large bowl. Toss to coat. Top with grated Parmesan cheese and serve.
fields.ingredients:
Romaine lettuce
Croutons
Caesar dressing
Parmesan cheese

fields.title: Pancakes
fields.content: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt. Add milk, eggs, and melted butter. Heat a skillet and pour batter to form pancakes. Cook until golden brown on each side.
fields.ingredients:
Flour
Baking powder
Sugar
Salt
Milk
Eggs
Butter

fields.title: Greek Salad
fields.content: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, olives, and feta cheese in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and season with oregano. Serve chilled.
fields.ingredients:
Tomatoes
Cucumber
Red onion
Olives
Feta cheese
Olive oil
Oregano

fields.title: Tomato Basil Soup
fields.content: Cook garlic in olive oil. Add tomatoes and simmer. Blend with fresh basil and season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
fields.ingredients:
Tomatoes
Garlic
Olive oil
Basil
Salt
Pepper
